alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 4:38AM MST until February 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch. The Winter Storm Watch is Cancelled due to an upgrade to a Winter Weather Advisory. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
